data.text: ...is a pretty good way to sum up my personal philosophy, haha.

"Oh, some people like a thing and it doesn't hurt anyone else?"
"Cool, I'm here for letting them do that, then, DUH!"
Sorry tweeple, I'm just rambling, my feed is full of irritating stuff today...but Ed Skrein made me happy.
Not Complicated: "that dude who messed up kids despite scientific evidence because he can't just chill the fuck out is an ASSHOLE."

Which, just...why? 
Complicated: "I disagree with how you want to reframe the law to better protect trans individuals in the workplace"
Meanwhile, about 80% of the people I follow are FREAKING OUT about how best to express disapproval of some ex-fake-doctor who doesn't get it

Concepts that are not complicated: "No, I'm a girl though." and "I think ALL genitalia are hot, tbh"
"...Okay, cool!"

Concepts that are complicated: "I want to deport immigrants"
..."can you maybe explain why?"
...anyway, I've seriously never been able to understand why the reaction to that information isn't just 'oh, okay! that's cool!'
(Obviously that definition was a little flawed, but we were twelve and it was the 90s, so hey...)
It reminds me of middle school me asking what transgender meant, and getting back 'when ppl say you look like a guy, but you're a girl'
Just...how much nicer would it be if we could all chill out, a little bit, and just ACCEPT new ideas!?
he said. “We all need to grow up. I’m going to be a spokesperson for pansexuality from here on out.”

...but the quote from Skrein was AWESOME. he wasn’t aware of the term “pansexual” until he got the part.
 “You know? This is 2016,”....
